data.title: Urban rooms of Sarajevo: Transforming urban public Spaces using interior design tools
data.meta_description: The book discloses the results of a first-of-a-kind research on the topic of public spaces in Sarajevo, and explores their historical genesis and c...
data.text: The book discloses the results of a first-of-a-kind research on the topic of public spaces in Sarajevo, and explores their historical genesis and current status, issues and challenges, as well as potentials for future urban transformations. Authors: Nermina Zagora and Dina Šamić Publisher: Faculty of Architecture, Univesity of Sarajevo Illustrations: Dunja Krvavac Book design: Mirna Ćesović Proofreading: Juliet Walker Year: 2021 City: Sarajevo Key words: architecture; urban design; urban public spaces; identity; in-betweenness; transition; urban voids; urban rooms; Sarajevo
